org.opends.sdk.ldif
Class LDIFOutputStreamWriter

java.lang.Object
  org.opends.sdk.ldif.LDIFOutputStreamWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Flushable, ChangeRecordWriter
public final class LDIFOutputStreamWriter
extends Object

A ChangeRecordWriter which writes change records to an OutputStream using the LDIF record format.

See Also:
RFC 2849 - The LDAP Data Interchange Format (LDIF) - Technical Specification

Method Summary

          Closes this change record writer, flushing it first.

Method Detail

newChangeWriter

public static LDIFOutputStreamWriter newChangeWriter(OutputStream out)
Creates a new LDIF change record writer whose destination is the provided output stream and which will be used for writing change records. The returned LDIF change record writer supports all types of change record as well as comments.

Parameters:
out - The output stream to use.
Returns:
The LDIF change record writer whose destination is out.

newEntryWriter

public static LDIFOutputStreamWriter newEntryWriter(OutputStream out)
Creates a new LDIF change record writer whose destination is the provided output stream and which will be used for writing attribute-value records. Specifically, all attempts to write Delete, Modify, or ModifyDN change records will be rejected with an UnsupportedOperationException. The returned LDIF change record writer supports comments.

Parameters:
out - The output stream to use.
Returns:
The LDIF change record writer whose destination is out.

flush

public void flush()
           throws IOException
Flushes this change record writer so that any buffered data is written immediately to underlying stream, flushing the stream if it is also Flushable.

If the intended destination of this stream is an abstraction provided by the underlying operating system, for example a file, then flushing the stream guarantees only that bytes previously written to the stream are passed to the operating system for writing; it does not guarantee that they are actually written to a physical device such as a disk drive.

Specified by:
flush in interface Flushable
Specified by:
flush in interface ChangeRecordWriter
Throws:
IOException - If an error occurs while flushing.

setAddUserFriendlyComments

public LDIFOutputStreamWriter setAddUserFriendlyComments(boolean addUserFriendlyComments)
Specifies whether or not user-friendly comments should be added whenever distinguished names or UTF-8 attribute values are encountered which contained non-ASCII characters.

Parameters:
addUserFriendlyComments - true if user-friendly comments should be added.
Returns:
A reference to this LDIFOutputStreamWriter.

setWrapColumn

public LDIFOutputStreamWriter setWrapColumn(int wrapColumn)
Specifies the column at which long lines should be wrapped. A value less than or equal to zero indicates that no wrapping should be performed.

Parameters:
wrapColumn - The column at which long lines should be wrapped.
Returns:
A reference to this LDIFOutputStreamWriter.

close

public final void close()
                 throws IOException
Closes this change record writer, flushing it first. Closing a previously closed change record writer has no effect.

Specified by:
close in interface Closeable
Specified by:
close in interface ChangeRecordWriter
Throws:
IOException - If an error occurs while closing.
